attributes.action: Ensure that car warranties bought with a second hand car are adhered to by the supplier.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Claims made on Warranties bought with second hand cars are often denied with no real reason, or are denied because the part, even when specifically listed, has not 'failed' but has worn out or just broken down. Clever wording denies most claims, and the law need to be changed to stop this underhand practice.
